thread.title: Jack Wilshere to ditch Arsenal for AC Milan? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers
thread.title_full: Jack Wilshere to ditch Arsenal for AC Milan? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers

author: Alex Smith
title: Jack Wilshere to ditch Arsenal for AC Milan? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers
text:
Sport Jack Wilshere to ditch Arsenal for AC Milan? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers PLUS: Milan battle for Moussa Sissoko and Yaya Toure and Ross Barkley in high demand in north London Share Jack Wilshere could be wearing red and black again next season (Photo: Alex Livesey)   
Jack Wilshere is ready to dump the Premier League for a move to AC Milan , according to the Daily Mail . 
Arsenal midfielder Wilshere is on a season loan at Bournemouth - as he attempts to prove his fitness. 
The former England star has managed to get through the season without a major injury - but has failed to start the Cherries' last three matches. 
Milan were among the sides vying for his signature last summer and will renew their attention when the window reopens in July. 
Wilshere, who has been recommended the move to Italy by David Beckham, has only got one-year left on his current deal - although his £90,000-a-week wages could prove a sticking point. 
Eddie Howe remains interested in Wilshere's movements but is not as keen as he was a few months ago. Top stories from the Sunday Mirror and Sunday People Jaap Stam could be on his way to the London Stadium (Photo: Dan Mullan)

Arsenal targeting move for Leicester keeper Kasper Schmeichel in clear sign Wenger is planning to stay Kasper Schmeichel is wanted by Arsenal (Photo: REUTERS)
